Voyager
SUPERYACHT

For Sailing Holiday Companies

Discover more Get a free trial

Manage navigation requirements with greater accuracy, track yachts wherever they are in the world and operate more cost-effectively with cost price supplies.

Start saving

Voyager for sailing holiday companies

Voyager SUPERYACHT allows you to manage your fleet’s navigation requirements more efficiently.

It gives you access to chart and publication inventories and compliance records right when you need them. Port calls, sailing hours, nautical miles as well as navigational costs can be seen at a glance across the fleet to help you stay better informed about overall operational performance.

We even provide the software to enable routes to be planned onboard, uploaded and monitored against live vessel positions to ensure better yacht safety and security.

  • Start saving

Track your fleet in any location

Voyager SUPERYACHT includes global terrestrial and satellite AIS yacht tracking. Positions are updated every 10-minutes for enhanced shore-based awareness. Display yacht positions in wallboard mode in office and reception areas or view on any device.

Paper, digital or both

The choice is yours, with Voyager SUPERYACHT offers you the option to sail with paper or digital charts and publications or both. Our Pay as you Sail ENC service provides near-worldwide open access to ENCs with monthly billing based on where a yacht has sailed.

Pristine paper charts for each new sailing season

Our carefully compiled British Admiralty paper chart folios are freshly printed to order using state-of-the-art digital printers located in GNS office locations worldwide each time you change sailing area. And every chart in the box is delivered with all chart corrections professionally applied ensuring you have the latest, fully up to date charts onboard. For a lower environmental footprint, return used charts to us and we’ll pass them on to maritime colleges where they are used for cadet training.

Better compliance management

With Voyager SUPERYACHT we give you the tools to see exactly which products each vessel needs to sail safely and compliantly tailored to your Flag. Instantly see what’s missing and what you don’t need in a very visual way so it’s easy to work out where you need to focus crew attention to enhance safety and eliminate compliance risks.

Cost price supplies

With Voyager SUPERYACHT you get all your navigation supplies at cost price (that’s zero mark up to GNS). That gives us a shared incentive to never sell you more than you need and help you drive down costs whilst at the same time enhancing your navigation safety and compliance.

Responsible tourism

Voyager SUPERYACHT software is always delivered on bamboo USBs not plastic and all our packaging is produced using only FSC accredited materials and is 100% recyclable - helping you to deliver on your responsible tourism objectives.
